body_html: https://github.com/timgaripov/swa could be implemented in this _LRScheduler framework. The step function would have to return the weight of the moving average, and the user would have to update the moving average of the model weights themselves.

body: https://github.com/timgaripov/swa could be implemented in this `_LRScheduler` framework. The `step` function would have to return the weight of the moving average, and the user would have to update the moving average of the model weights themselves.
